Animal Name: Alpine Ibex
Scientific Name: Capra ibex
IUCN Conservation Status: Least Concern
Habitats: Rocky Areas (e.g., inland cliffs, mountain peaks)
Continents: Europe
Countries: Italy, Austria, France, Germany, Switzerland
Summary: The Alpine ibex is a species of wild goat that lives in the mountains of the European Alps. It is a sexually dimorphic species: males are larger and carry longer, curved horns than females.
